title: Enslaved people
common:
Description

On this page, we list events where people were reported as enslaved.

value.name: The Banu Qasi:
value.desc: They could have had an enslaved person in their lineage because Lubb ibn Musa married Ayab, who had been enslaved by the "Mayus" (Vikings). However, this cannot be confirmed definitively due to their non-monogamous practices.

value.name: Os Visigodos (Egica):
value.desc: The 16th Council of Toledo, held during the reign of Egica, describes the situation of some enslaved individuals.

value.name: Joaquina "Cabra":
value.desc: She was still enslaved at the beginning of the 19th century and had at least one child who inherited her social status.
